==Level Scaling of Drop Rate==
<math>\text{Drop Mean}_\text{Any Reward Tier} = \text{Drop Mean}_\text{Reward Tier 18} \times \text{Ratio}</math>

<math>\text{Ratio} =
  \begin{cases}
    \text{Reward Tier} \div 30 + 0.4 & \text{Reward Tier} \le 18 \\
    1 & \text{Reward Tier} > 18
  \end{cases}</math>

The Ratio for different Enemy Levels:
